issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Ti.Filesystem is missing some important functionality:
{code}
Ti.Filesystem:
Props 	-	MODE_APPEND
			MODE_READ
			MODE_WRITE
			rowsAffected
			applicationSupportDirectory
			externalStorageDirectory
			lineEnding
			resRawDirectory
			separator

Methods	-	createTempDirectory
			createTempFile
			isExternalStoragePresent
			openStream
{code}
{code}
Ti.Filesystem.File
Props	-	executable
			hidden
			name
			nativePath
			parent
			readonly
			size
			remoteBackup
			symbolicLink
			writable
			writeable

Methods	-	copy
			createTimestamp
			getParent
			modificationTimestamp
			move
			open
			resolve
			spaceAvailable
{code}
h4. Note
Some of these will not be part of BB as they are not natively supported. I will update this ticket as I go along exposing this API

comments.body: We should not mark a ticket resolved until the PR has been reviewed and merged.
